name: xkcd - Infinite Saber
description:
For the xkcd gamejam. Based on the xkcd comic #1433.

How do you actually use a light saber that doesn't  end?  Can you traverse the level, while also keeping it intact?

I really liked the ridiculous nature of the comic found here:

https://xkcd.com/1433/

...and was hoping to capture that in this gamejam challenge. At the moment, it's a bit more of an interactive humor comic. :P But I Iiked the idea of balancing when to turn on your saber to attack/defend and traversing the level.

Update 1.0.2:

Various bug fixes. Title screen UI works with controller now.

(Added mac and linux versions. Both untested at the moment).

Update 1.0.1:

Added more final anims and other tweaks.

CTRLS:

Can be played with mouse/keyboard or controller. 

Keyboard Controls-

WASD to move. Space or W to jump. Left-mouse-click uses your saber, right-mouse deploys it. Press W or space to double-jump.

Controller-

Left analog stick moves. A for jump. Press A again to double-jump. X for attack. B to deploy.
